meanings.definition: The place or type of surroundings where something is positioned or where an event takes place.
meanings.sent1: In the park, the beautiful settings made the picnic enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the settings on her camera to capture the perfect shot.
meanings.sent3: The settings for the play were so realistic that the audience felt like they were in a different world.
meanings.sent4: The settings of the old house whispered stories of the past to anyone who entered.
meanings.sent5: The settings of the movie were so vivid that it felt like you were right there with the characters.

meanings.definition: The adjustment or configuration of something, such as a device or software.
meanings.sent1: He changed the settings on his phone to increase the screen brightness.
meanings.sent2: The settings for the new software needed to be customized for optimal performance.
meanings.sent3: The settings on the thermostat were set so high that it felt like a sauna in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her settings for the email notifications were so specific that she never missed an important message.
meanings.sent5: The settings on the blender were perfect for making smoothies in the morning.

meanings.definition: The background or environment in which a story or event occurs.
meanings.sent1: The settings of the novel were in a magical land filled with talking animals.
meanings.sent2: The settings of the painting depicted a serene countryside scene.
meanings.sent3: The settings for the party were extravagant, with decorations covering every inch of the room.
meanings.sent4: Her settings for the story created a mysterious atmosphere that kept readers on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent5: The settings of the play transported the audience to a different time and place.
